SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
CharactersAndColors
This class contains a number of constant strings representing text colors and styles that are used to customize the appearance of output of our board.
Command
Commands that are available to be used by connect four game.
CommandHandler
All the commands implement the interface command handler
ConnectFourBoard
Class responsible for creating a board of the game and saves the board positions.
ConnectFourHandler
Class ConnectFourHandler implements the interface Runnable.
GameLauncher
Class responsible for creating the gameServer
GameServer
Implements the connection between the GameServer and the players (or two machines)
Messages
Messages sent to player by connect four game
PlayAgainHandler
When the game is over the player can choose if he wants play again by writting in the console "/playagain
Player
 
QuitHandler
When the game is over the player can choose if he wants to quit the game and close their connection
Sound
Class responsible to sent a sound effect for connect four game
SoundFiles
Sounds sent to player by connect four game when is playing the game
